articles.title: Impeachment live updates: Pelosi poised to name House managers ahead of transmission of impeachment articles against Trump to Senate
articles.description: A vote scheduled Wednesday in the House will enable the Senate to begin preliminary steps Thursday in a historic trial of President Trump, centered on his conduct toward Ukraine.
articles.content:
Pelosi on Wednesday plans to announce the team of House managers who will prosecute the case against Trump in a Senate trial, ahead of a vote on a resolution that will trigger transmission of the articles of impeachment to the other side of the Capitol.
